summary: The Department of Veterans Affairs had trouble getting medical supplies—including personal protective equipment—early in the COVID-19 pandemic. VA has several initiatives underway intended to modernize its supply chain and prepare for future public health emergencies. But each one is delayed and in early planning stages. title: VA COVID-19 Procurements: Pandemic Underscores Urgent Need to Modernize Supply Chain
